greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: First differences of the Beatty sequence A276854 for 1 + sqrt(5).
link: Clark Kimberling, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: a(n) = floor(n*r) - floor(n*r - r), where r = 1 + sqrt(5), n >= 1.
a(n) = A188187(n) + 3, as follows right from the definitions. - _Michel Dekking_, Sep 02 2019
program: def A276863(n): return 1+integer_nthroot(5*n**2,2)[0]-integer_nthroot(5*(n-1)**2,2)[0] # _Chai Wah Wu_, Mar 16 2021
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_, Sep 24 2016
